question_text:
Question 34 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MCQ (1M) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Question ID : 823251539 
 
Consider the following array
 
 
 
23 
32 
45 
69 
72 
73 
89 
97 
 
Which algorithm out of the following option uses the least number of comparisons (among the array 
elements) to sort the above array in ascending order ? 
 
(A) Mergesort 
 
 
(B) Quick sort using last element ass pivot 
 
 
(C) Selection sort  
 
 
(D) Insertion sort 
Ans. 
D 
Sol.
 
Given array is already sorted hence
Insertion sort will uses the least number of comparison.
